sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' const Banking1 = () => { const [ balance, setBalance] = useState({ value1: 100, value2: 200, value3:300 }) const handleForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target[0].value) console.log(e.target[1].value) console.log(e.target[2].value) const valueToUpdate = Number(e.target[2].value) if( e.target[0].value === 'Ashray' && e.target[1].value === 'Sanket Bhaiya') { setBalance({...balance, value1 : balance.value1+valueToUpdate, value3: balance.value3-valueToUpdate }) } else if(e.target[0].value === 'Ashray' && e.target[1].value === 'Aagman' ) { setBalance({...balance, value1 : balance.value1+valueToUpdate, value3: balance.value2-valueToUpdate }) } } return (
Firstname Lastname Balance
Ashray Parmar {balance.value1}
Aagman Suri {balance.value2}
Sanket Khandekar {balance.value3}
) } export default Banking1
